Developer Terms of Use
des:
OnGuardian empowers family caregivers to deliver care to their loved ones by streamlining collaboration and access to information to the caregiver support team. Use your own voice with Amazon Alexa to request assistance and let your caregivers know what you need and how you feel. The OnGuardian app will seamlessly notify caregivers about the incoming requests and will keep track of them so that everyone stays informed, and it will also alert everyone if an emergency is reported.

OnGuardian features:

* Login in seamlessly with your existing Amazon account
* Register your caregiving team: including the primary caregiver, care recipient, and your secondary caregivers
* Voice activated support for care recipients, loved ones, and seniors makes it easy to ask for assistance
* Receive incoming notifications on your phone from your loved ones, that includes alerts such as: Requests for assistance with fixing things at home and notifications about their general well being
* Emergency alerts for falls and other critical problems

Note: Our platform is built considering that our care recipients will have access to an Amazon Alexa device, such as an Amazon Echo, Dot or Tap; the hands free voice interaction makes OnGuardian a breeze to use for care recipients. OnGuardian can also work with any device that has supports Alexa Voice Services.

Phone call information: Caregivers will receive calls from +1 (832) 225-3632 for emergency requests.

You will need to download our companion app here:
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.onguardian.app

We would love to hear from you. Please let us know how we are doings as we are continue to develop our platform.

To learn more, please see our brief video:
https://youtu.be/iBi69mAwE7g

-OnGuardian Team
